column5: 202 Breezy Way is perfect for singles, couples, groups with kids, dogs, or other. You will enjoy sunsets overlooking the lake and access to the best of The Woodlands only 5 minutes away:  The Pavillion - Concerts  Market Street - Shopping, eating, & more WaterWay - Restaurants & Bars  Hughes Landing - Restaurants, shopping, & more   You will also have access to your own private club house with a full size gym & pool. No matter the size of your group, this is Your next stay.
